kwargs2str[source]

kwargs2str(**kwargs)

kwargs to string split with ,

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
kwargs2str(a='a', b='b', c='ccc')

'a: a, b: b, c: ccc'
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

sorted_dict[source]

sorted_dict(x, comp='key', **kwargs)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
test_data = {
    '199': 100,
    '020': 1000,
    '600': 20,
    '333': 200
}
sorted_dict(test_data)

{'020': 1000, '199': 100, '333': 200, '600': 20}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
sorted_dict(test_data, comp='value')

{'600': 20, '199': 100, '333': 200, '020': 1000}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
sorted_dict(test_data, comp='value', reverse=True)

{'020': 1000, '333': 200, '199': 100, '600': 20}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

get_count_data_datetime[source]

get_count_data_datetime(input_df, count_column, date_time_column:str=None, agg_method='sum', cumsum:bool=False, resample_mode:str='d', extra_meta_column:str=None)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
df = pd.DataFrame({
 'date': {0: '2000-03-01',
          1: '2000-03-02',
          2: '2000-03-03',
          3: '2000-03-06',
          4: '2000-03-07',
          5: '2000-03-08',
          6: '2000-03-09',
          7: '2000-03-10'},
 'open': {0: 118.56,
          1: 127.0,
          2: 124.87,
          3: 126.0,
          4: 126.44,
          5: 122.87,
          6: 120.87,
          7: 121.69},
 'cat': {0: 'A',
         1: 'B',
         2: 'C',
         3: 'B',
         4: 'A',
         5: 'A',
         6: 'C',
         7: 'C'}
  })
{% endraw %}
